actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill amend title V of the Housing Act of 1949 to allow certain property held by the United States under such title to be subject to certain taxation by appropriate State and local entities.

summary.text: Amends the Housing Act of 1949 to permit States, territories, and local political subdivisions to tax property subject to a lien held by the United States or otherwise held by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development under Title IV of such Act.

titles.title: A bill amend title V of the Housing Act of 1949 to allow certain property held by the United States under such title to be subject to certain taxation by appropriate State and local entities.
